channel.title: Projects on Syed Muhammad Hamza
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Syed Muhammad Hamza

item.title: Project 1: Myersâ€“Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI) classification Web Application
item.description: Github link Web Application web application screenshot Overview During my sophomore year of bachelors, I stumbled upon a book titled “Gifts differing: understanding personality type” by Isabel Briggs Myers and Peter B. Myers through a friend I met on Reddit “This book distinguishes four categories of personality styles and shows how these qualities determine the way you perceive the world and come to conclusions about what you’ve seen”

item.title: Project 2: Politician-Face-Classifier
item.description: GitHub link Web Application Web Scraping Collected images from google through web-scraping using Selenium with ChromeDriver Code Link Data Cleaning Performed data cleaning through face detection using OpenCV pre-trained feature-based Haar cascade classifiers to discard images from the dataset without face and two eyes visible Feature engineering Performed feature engineering through extraction by wavelet transformation of images using PyWavelets and then vertically stacking raw and wavelet transformed images Model Building trained machine learning models such as Logistic Regression, SVM(Support vector machine), and Ensembling bagging Random Forest

item.title: Project 3: Handwritten Digit Recognizer
item.description: Handwritten Digit Recognizer Github link Web Application Neural Network from scratch in Python to recognize handwritten digit achieved 98.45% test accuracy and using Keras CNN(Convolutional neural network) achieved 99.25% test accuracy deployed model to production Dataset Deep Neural network (DNN) Neural Network Implementation from scratch using Python Model representation Implemented Neural network has 3 layers an input layer,a hidden layer and an output layer. Feedforward and Regularized Cross entropy cost function Implementation of DNN includes code for Feedforward and Regularized Cross entropy cost function Backpropagation Implementation of DNN includes code for Backpropagation Model Performance DNN: 98.

item.title: AndroidCipherApplication
item.description: Github Link An Android-based application build using the MVC model That allows users to Encipher(encrypt) and Decipher( decrypt) text using using following Ciphers Shift Cipher Vigenere Cipher Substitution Cipher Playfair Cipher
